item.title: User subscription started
item.description: An event that is triggered when a new user subscription has started

item.title: User subscription cancelled
item.description: An event that is triggered when a users subscription has been cancelled

item.title: Subscribe user
item.description: Command that will try and subscribe a given user

item.title: Cancel subscription
item.description: Command that will try and cancel a users subscription

item.title: User Cancels Subscription
item.description: Flow for when a user has cancelled a subscription

item.title: User Cancels Subscription
item.description: Flow for when a user has cancelled a subscription

item.title: Payment Processed
item.description: Event is triggered after the payment has been successfully processed

item.title: Payment Processed
item.description: Event is triggered after the payment has been successfully processed

item.title: Payment Initiated
item.description: Event is triggered when a user initiates a payment through the Payment Service

item.title: Payment Flow for customers
item.description: Business flow for processing payments in an e-commerce platform

item.title: Shipment in transit
item.description: Event that is emitted when a shipment is in transit.

item.title: Shipment dispatched
item.description: Event that is emitted when a shipment is dispatched.

item.title: Shipment delivered
item.description: Event that is emitted when a shipment is delivered.

item.title: Shipment created
item.description: Event that is emitted when a shipment is created.

item.title: Return initiated
item.description: Event that is emitted when a return is initiated.

item.title: Delivery failed
item.description: Event that is emitted when a shipment delivery fails.

item.title: Update shipment status
item.description: POST request that will update the status of a shipment, identified by its shipmentId.

item.title: Create shipment
item.description: POST request that will create a shipment for a specific order, identified by its orderId.

item.title: Create return label
item.description: POST request that will create a return label for a specific shipment, identified by its shipmentId.

item.title: Cancel shipment
item.description: POST request that will cancel a shipment, identified by its shipmentId.
